items.name: Blight Spire
implicitMods: Corrupted Blood cannot be inflicted on you
explicitMods: +8% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier
6% increased Attack Speed with Staves
10% increased Flask Effect Duration
18% increased Damage with Bleeding
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Pandemonium Solace
enchantMods: 1 Added Passive Skill is a Jewel Socket
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 10% increased Damage over Time
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +5 to Intelligence
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +3 to Strength
1 Added Passive Skill is Brewed for Potency
1 Added Passive Skill is Student of Decay
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Forbidden Flame
explicitMods: Allocates Unbreakable if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flesh
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The minds of those studied utterly by the Cleansing Fire
continue to think and dream and beg for silence...

Passives in radius are Conquered by the Maraketh

items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: They believed themselves the most ordered, but that tradition turned their forests to salt.

items.name: Watcher's Eye

5% increased maximum Life
6% increased maximum Mana

they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.
